column6:
Two new tales torn from the web-slinger's world. First, how far will J. Jonah Jameson's new intern go in order to get in good with the old man? And then, can Peter Parker inadvertently save the city from a suicide bomber?,2005,7
32 PGS./T+ SUGGESTED FOR TEENS AND UP ...$2.99
column8: | penciller (cover):Gabriele Dell'Otto | penciller:Pia Guerra | penciller:Greg Tocchini | writer:Maria-Emiko Macuaga | writer:Marc Sumerak
